23500.name: Entrance to the Goblin Warrens
23500.description:
A jagged crack in the hillside opens into darkness below. The stench of
rot and smoke wafts up from the depths. Crude goblin totems fashioned
from bones and feathers flank the entrance, warning trespassers away.
Scratched into the rock are tally marks — hundreds of them.

north.description: A forest trail leads back to the wilderness.

down.description: Rough-hewn steps descend into the warrens.

23501.name: A Twisting Tunnel
23501.description:
The tunnel winds erratically through packed earth and stone, barely tall
enough for a human to stand upright. Goblin graffiti covers the walls —
crudely drawn stick figures in violent poses. Small alcoves have been
carved into the walls, holding guttering tallow candles.

up.description: Steps lead up to the entrance.

23502.name: A Trapped Corridor
23502.description:
Suspicious holes line the walls at ankle and chest height. The floor is
uneven, with certain flagstones sitting slightly higher than others. A
few rusted crossbow bolts are embedded in the far wall, evidence that
the traps here are very real. Goblin laughter echoes faintly ahead.

south.description: The corridor continues past the traps.

23503.name: A Guard Post
23503.description:
A crude barricade of overturned carts and sharpened stakes blocks most
of the tunnel. Behind it, a small fire pit smolders, and the remains of
a recent meal — mostly bones — are scattered about. This is clearly a
forward guard position for the goblin tribe.

north.description: The trapped corridor lies to the north.

west.description: A wider passage opens to the west.

23504.name: Goblin Barracks
23504.description:
Filthy straw pallets line the walls, each barely more than a pile of
rags. Crude weapons — chipped swords, bent spears, clubs studded with
nails — are stacked in disorganized heaps. The air is thick with the
stench of unwashed goblin. Dozens sleep here, though the room could
hold twice as many.

east.description: The guard post lies to the east.

23505.name: A Narrow Crevice
23505.description:
You squeeze through a crack barely wide enough for a human. The walls
are slick with moisture and some luminescent fungus provides an eerie
blue-green glow. Spider webs stretch across the upper reaches, thick
as rope and sticky to the touch.

west.description: The main tunnel lies to the west.

east.description: The crevice widens into a cavern.

23506.name: Spider Nest Cavern
23506.description:
Thick webs blanket every surface of this domed cavern. Cocooned shapes
hang from the ceiling — some goblin-sized, others disturbingly larger.
The webs vibrate with unseen movement. Egg sacs the size of melons
cluster in the corners, some already split open. Bones crunch underfoot.

23507.name: A Descending Passage
23507.description:
The tunnel slopes sharply downward, the walls growing damper as you
descend. Crude steps have been hacked into the stone at irregular
intervals. The sound of rushing water grows louder with each step.
Moss and pale fungus cling to every surface.

north.description: The passage ascends to the guard post.

south.description: The tunnel opens into a larger space.

23508.name: The Mushroom Farm
23508.description:
A vast cavern has been converted into an underground garden. Rows upon
rows of mushrooms grow in carefully tended beds of composted refuse.
Some caps glow with phosphorescent light, illuminating the space in
shifting colors. Goblin farmers tend the crops with surprising care,
the one task they seem to take seriously.

south.description: More mushroom beds stretch to the south.

west.description: A tunnel leads toward the sound of water.

23509.name: Deep Mushroom Groves
23509.description:
The mushrooms here grow enormous — some taller than a goblin, their
caps broad enough to shelter under. Bioluminescent spores drift through
the air like lazy fireflies. The air is thick and humid, almost tropical.
Something about the spores makes your head swim pleasantly.

east.description: A passage leads toward the goblin market.

23510.name: Underground River Bank
23510.description:
A swift underground river cuts through the stone here, its dark waters
rushing past with surprising force. A crude rope bridge spans the gap,
swaying dangerously. The goblins have built a small dock of lashed-
together timbers on this side, where a few leaky coracles are tied up.

east.description: The mushroom farm lies to the east.

west.description: The rope bridge crosses the river.

23511.name: Far Side of the River
23511.description:
Having crossed the treacherous rope bridge, you stand on a narrow ledge
on the river's far side. The water roars below, black and cold. A tunnel
has been carved into the rock face here, leading deeper into territory
the common goblins seem to avoid. Large, heavy footprints mark the mud.

east.description: The rope bridge leads back across the river.

west.description: Heavy footprints lead into a large tunnel.

23512.name: Shaman's Antechamber
23512.description:
Strange symbols painted in blood and mushroom dye cover every surface.
Small animal skulls hang from the ceiling on sinew threads, clacking
together in an unfelt breeze. The air smells of incense and something
acrid. Fetishes made of bone and feather ward the entrance to the south.

west.description: The main passage lies to the west.

south.description: The shaman's sanctum lies beyond the fetishes.

23513.name: The Shaman's Sanctum
23513.description:
A large fire pit dominates the center of this circular chamber, its
flames burning an unnatural green. Shelves carved into the walls hold
jars of preserved organs, dried herbs, and things best left unidentified.
A throne of stacked skulls sits against the far wall, and the air
crackles with crude but potent magical energy.

north.description: The antechamber lies to the north.

23514.name: Goblin Market
23514.description:
A chaotic bazaar fills this wide cavern. Goblins hawk stolen goods from
ramshackle stalls — dented armor, chipped weapons, moldy food, and the
occasional genuinely valuable item pilfered from unlucky travelers.
Arguments and fistfights break out constantly over prices and territory.

west.description: The mushroom groves lie to the west.

north.description: A wide tunnel leads toward the throne room.

23515.name: Cave Troll Den
23515.description:
The stench hits you before you see anything — a wall of rotting meat
and unwashed troll. This large cavern serves as home to the warrens'
cave trolls, kept as enforcers by the goblin king. Enormous bones are
scattered about, cracked open for marrow. The trolls eye you with
dim but hungry intelligence.

east.description: The tunnel leads back toward the river.

north.description: A passage leads toward the throne room.

23516.name: Approach to the Throne
23516.description:
The tunnel widens dramatically here, its walls reinforced with timber
and crude masonry. Goblin banners — scraps of cloth daubed with tribal
symbols — hang from iron spikes. Two massive braziers burn on either
side of a pair of heavy wooden doors to the north, flanked by the
king's elite guard.

south.description: The goblin market lies to the south.

north.description: Heavy doors lead to the throne room.

west.description: A passage leads to the troll pens.

23517.name: Behind the Throne
23517.description:
A cramped passage connects the troll den to the back of the throne room.
This is the king's escape route — and his way of unleashing trolls on
enemies from behind. The walls are scratched with claw marks, and the
floor is worn smooth by heavy troll feet.

south.description: The cave troll den lies to the south.

east.description: The approach to the throne lies east.

north.description: A hidden entrance to the throne room.

23518.name: The Goblin Throne Room
23518.description:
A surprisingly grand chamber opens before you, its vaulted ceiling
supported by natural stone pillars. At the far end, atop a dais built
from plundered stonework, sits a massive throne cobbled together from
weapons, shields, and bones. Torches line the walls, casting flickering
light over piles of tribute — coins, gems, and stolen goods heaped
carelessly around the throne. This is the seat of power for the entire
warren.

east.description: A passage leads to the king's treasury.

23519.name: The King's Treasury
23519.description:
Behind a heavy iron door lies the goblin king's personal hoard. Chests
of stolen coins, racks of pilfered weapons, bolts of cloth, and crates
of provisions fill the room. A large iron-bound chest sits in the center,
secured with three heavy locks. This is the accumulated plunder of
years of raiding surface settlements.

west.description: The throne room lies to the west.

23500.name: goblin scout
23500.long_desc: A wiry goblin crouches here, watching the tunnels with beady eyes.
23500.description: This small, green-skinned creature is lean and quick, with oversized ears that twitch at every sound. It carries a short bow and a quiver of crude arrows, and its eyes dart about constantly, alert for intruders.

23501.name: goblin scout
23501.long_desc: A goblin scout lurks in the shadows, arrow nocked.
23501.description: Another of the warrens' many sentries, this goblin wears dark leather and keeps to the shadows. Its bow is strung and ready.

23502.name: goblin guard
23502.long_desc: A goblin guard stands behind the barricade, spear in hand.
23502.description: Larger than the scouts, this goblin wears a crude iron helmet and carries a spear with a jagged tip. It stands its ground with unusual discipline for its kind.

23503.name: goblin guard
23503.long_desc: A goblin guard patrols the barracks entrance.
23503.description: This guard looks bored but alert, occasionally prodding sleeping goblins with the butt of its spear.

23504.name: cave spider
23504.long_desc: A massive cave spider crouches among the webs, its many eyes gleaming.
23504.description: This spider is the size of a large dog, its bloated body covered in coarse black hair. Venom drips from fangs as long as daggers. It moves with terrifying speed among its webs.

23505.name: cave spider
23505.long_desc: A venomous spider descends from the ceiling on a silk thread.
23505.description: Slightly smaller than its nest-mate but more aggressive, this spider's abdomen pulses with venom sacs visible through translucent chitin.

23506.name: goblin farmer
23506.long_desc: A goblin tends the mushroom beds with a small trowel.
23506.description: This goblin is plumper than most, with soil-stained hands and a surprisingly gentle demeanor. It hums tunelessly while working the fungal gardens.

23507.name: goblin farmer
23507.long_desc: A goblin farmer harvests glowing mushrooms into a basket.
23507.description: This fungus-tender carries a woven basket overflowing with luminescent mushroom caps. It seems more interested in its work than in fighting.

23508.name: goblin shaman
23508.long_desc: A goblin shaman dances around the green fire, chanting.
23508.description: Taller than most goblins and draped in a cloak of bat wings, this shaman wields crude but genuine magical power. Its eyes glow faintly green, and sparks crackle between its gnarled fingers. Bone fetishes rattle at its belt.

23509.name: goblin berserker
23509.long_desc: A scarred goblin berserker paces restlessly, axes in both hands.
23509.description: This goblin is covered in ritual scars and war paint. Larger and more muscular than its kin, it fights with reckless fury, dual-wielding crude hand axes. Foam flecks its lips.

23510.name: goblin berserker
23510.long_desc: A frothing goblin berserker guards the throne room approach.
23510.description: Elite among the goblin warriors, this berserker has proven itself in countless battles. Its axes are notched but sharp, and its eyes hold a manic gleam.

23511.name: cave troll
23511.long_desc: A massive cave troll squats here, gnawing on a bone.
23511.description: Standing nearly eight feet tall, this troll is a mountain of grey-green muscle and thick hide. Its small, piggy eyes regard you with dim malice. Regenerating flesh knits over old wounds even as you watch.

23512.name: cave troll
23512.long_desc: A battle-scarred troll looms in the shadows, sniffing the air.
23512.description: This troll bears the marks of many fights — missing fingers, a torn ear, burns that failed to fully regenerate. Despite its wounds, it remains a terrifying combatant.

23513.name: Goblin King Grizznak
23513.long_desc: Goblin King Grizznak sits upon his throne of weapons, surveying his domain.
23513.description: Grizznak is enormous for a goblin — nearly human-sized, with thick muscles and cunning intelligence gleaming in his yellow eyes. A crown of beaten gold sits atop his scarred head, and he wields a massive cleaver in one hand. He has united the scattered goblin tribes through a combination of brutality, cunning, and the loyalty of his cave troll enforcers. He will not give up his throne without a fight to the death.

23514.name: goblin merchant
23514.long_desc: A goblin merchant hawks questionable wares from a rickety stall.
23514.description: This goblin wears a patchwork vest with dozens of pockets, each stuffed with trinkets and stolen goods. It grins with a mouthful of gold-capped teeth, beckoning you closer.

23500.name: Crown of the Goblin King
23500.short_desc: the Crown of the Goblin King
23500.room_desc: A crown of beaten gold, studded with crude gems, lies here.

23501.name: Troll-Hide Shield
23501.room_desc: A large shield covered in thick, grey-green troll hide rests against the wall.

23502.name: Shaman's Totem
23502.room_desc: A gnarled wooden totem pulsing with green energy lies here.

23503.name: Grizznak's Cleaver
23503.room_desc: A massive, blood-stained cleaver lies on the ground.

23504.name: spider silk rope
23504.short_desc: a coil of spider silk rope
23504.room_desc: A coil of incredibly strong spider silk rope lies here.

23505.name: luminescent mushroom
23505.room_desc: A softly glowing mushroom sits on the ground.
